When I saw these glasses in person,  they took me off my feet  !!!
Absolutely love them got them for my photo shoot and they were everything
Received and hinge broken upon opening. SAVE YOUR MONEY.!! TRIED TO CONTACT SELLER NUMEROUS TIMES AND NO REPLY.CHEAP JUNK. !! SAVE YOUR MONEY AND BUY SOMETHING THAT'S WORTH IT. !!!
Fashion statement. So unique and a great addition to any outfit!
I bought these for some fun, cheap glasses. They are surprisingly sturdy and very cute. I highly recommend

They really stylish. I really like them overall. The side glasses don't cover as much sun as hoped but still real good. Only thing that is troublesome is that the ear indents don't hook of your ears enough so if you were to Bob your head too much they probably fall off. When I rest on top of my head the slide down the back and fall off.
I will be ordering another pair
I love how they look on me. they fit great on my face and are comfortable. The sunglasses are great quality for the price. i want all of them at this point.
Ordered these for Renaissance and they were the EXACT pair that the queen had on! Super durable and cute!

I love these, not just because they’re cool looking, but because they have sunglass panels on the arms, which covers my eyes peripherally, especially when I’m driving.  The overall style is very cool. Do I think they’ll last forever? Probably not. But they’ll hold up for a while if you’re careful and the price is worth what your getting.  Lots of fun to wear. I’m getting lots of compliments.  Recommend.
